text: Terence Anthony "Terry" Sue-Patt (29 September 1964 - April/May 2015) was a British actor. He was best known for the role of Benny Green in the BBC television series Grange Hill (1978-1982). He also appeared in Jackanory. He was born in Islington, London to British Jamaican parents. Sue-Patt was found dead on 22 May 2015 in Walthamstow, London. He was 50 and is believed to have been dead for about a month. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1964 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Actors from London Category:Black British actors Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:People from Islington
title: Terry Sue-Patt
